episodes.title: The Heat: Epstein Investigation
episodes.description:
A stunning development in the Epstein investigation, the UK’s former Prince Andrew has been arrested on suspicion of misconduct in public office. 

The arrest comes months after Andrew was stripped of his titles and forced out of his royal residence over ties to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.  #Heat #UK #PrinceAndrew #Epstein #monarchy #windsorpalace 

Guests: 

Imani Cheers is a Cultural Curator and Professor of Digital Storytelling at George Washington University.
Richard Mullaney is the Executive Director of the Haskel Public Policy Institute at Jacksonville University. Jadan Horyn is a political analyst.
Jonathan Lis is a journalist and political commentator.

episodes.title: The Epstein Money Trail & Ongoing Fallout
episodes.description:
At the time of his death, U.S financier and convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein was worth around $600 million. His links to numerous high-profile people offered him unusual access and influence. So, who were those figures and how did Epstein build up so much wealth? CGTN’s Sean Callebs speaks to Mindy Gulati, the CEO of Fundamental Advisory and a criminal defense attorney about he amassed his wealth and ongoing fallout #bizshow #epstein #maxwell #epsteinvictims #princeandrew #finance #politics #business 

0:00 Ongoing fallout from the Epstein files
0:23 How Jeffrey Epstein built his wealth
0:52 Private financial management for billionaires
1:19 Les Wexner, Leon Black and key financial ties
1:40 Opaque services and complex money flows
2:00 Influence, power and financial leverage
2:16 Power of attorney and elite relationships
2:43 Why associates are distancing themselves
3:31 How Epstein bought his private islands
3:54 Leverage beyond the balance sheet
4:08 The reported $600 million fortune
4:20 Offshore trusts, real estate and aircraft
4:46 Why did so many give Epstein money?
5:00 DOJ file releases and global transparency
5:18 Potential civil actions ahead

episodes.title: U.S. lawmakers view unredacted Department of Justice files on Epstein
episodes.description:
CGTN’s Elaine Reyes speaks to Mindy Gulati, the CEO of Fundamental Advisory and a criminal defense attorney. They discuss the international implications and political fallout over the notorious case of Jeffrey Epstein.
